snippet.title: Wholesome Slaughter - Official Game Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Wholesome Slaughter is a Retro Style FPS being made by a student development team! 

Check out the Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1488640/Wholesome_Slaughter/
Check out the Itch page: https://gunshot25.itch.io/wholesome-s...
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/EclipseGameLabs

Follow the Devs:
https://twitter.com/DevSimeon
https://twitter.com/SpanMosGames
https://twitter.com/DevDeCesare

You'll be able to purchase the game on Itch starting December 10th, 2020. A Steam release will arrive within the next month or so. *All purchases on Itch will provide a Steam key if you wish to transfer the game to your Steam Library and get access to all other Steam features once the title has fully released on that platform.
